solution_line_template: The bigger sail will make the trip in {time_bigger_sail} hours because {total_distance} / {speed_bigger_sail} = <<{total_distance}/{speed_bigger_sail}={time_bigger_sail}>>{time_bigger_sail}
The smaller sail will make the trip in {time_smaller_sail} hours because {total_distance} / {speed_smaller_sail} = <<{total_distance}/{speed_smaller_sail}={time_smaller_sail}>>{time_smaller_sail}
The bigger sail will be {time_difference} hours faster because {time_smaller_sail} - {time_bigger_sail} = <<{time_smaller_sail}-{time_bigger_sail}={time_difference}>>{time_difference}
